021import java.io.IOException;

041import org.jdrupes.httpcodec.types.Converters;

060import org.jgrapes.io.IOSubchannel;

064import org.jgrapes.io.events.Output;
065import org.jgrapes.io.util.CharBufferWriter;

069import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleCommand;

076import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SimpleConsoleCommand;
077
078/**
079 * The server side base class for the web console single page 
080 * application (SPA). Its main tasks are to provide resources using 
081 * {@link Request}/{@link Response} events (see {@link #onGet}
082 * for details about the different kinds of resources), to create
083 * the {@link ConsoleSession}s for new WebSocket connections
084 * (see {@link #onUpgraded}) and to convert the JSON RPC messages 
085 * received from the browser via the web socket to {@link JsonInput} 
086 * events and fire them on the corresponding {@link ConsoleSession}
087 * channel.
088 * 
089 * The class has a counter part in the browser, the `jgconsole`
090 * JavaScript module (see 
091 * <a href="jsdoc/classes/Console.html">functions</a>)
092 * that can be loaded as `console-base-resource/jgconsole.js` 
093 * (relative to the configured prefix). 
094 * 
095 * The class also provides handlers for some console related events
096 * (i.e. fired on the attached {@link WebConsole}'s channel) that 
097 * affect the console representation in the browser. These handlers
098 * are declared with class channel {@link ConsoleSession} which
099 * is replaced using the {@link ChannelReplacements} mechanism.
100 */
101@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ExcessiveImports", "PMD.NcssCount",
102    "PMD.TooManyMethods", "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
103public abstract class ConsoleWeblet extends Component {
104
105    private static final String CONSOLE_SESSION_IDS
106        = ConsoleWeblet.class.getName() + ".consoleSessionId";
107    private static final String UTF_8 = "utf-8";
108
109    private URI prefix;
110    private final WebConsole console;
111    private ResourcePattern requestPattern;
112
113    private final RenderSupport renderSupport = new RenderSupportImpl();
114    private boolean useMinifiedResources = true;
115    private long csNetworkTimeout = 45_000;
116    private long csRefreshInterval = 30_000;
117    private long csInactivityTimeout = -1;
118
119    private List<Class<?>> consoleResourceSearchSeq;
120    private final List<Class<?>> resourceClasses = new ArrayList<>();
121    private final ResourceBundle.Control resourceControl
122        = new ConsoleResourceBundleControl(resourceClasses);
123    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
124    private final Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> supportedLocales
125        = new HashMap<>();
126
127    /**
128     * The class used in handler annotations to represent the 
129     * console channel.
130     */
131    protected class ConsoleChannel extends ClassChannel {
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * Instantiates a new console weblet. The weblet handles
136     * {@link Get} events for URIs that start with the
137     * specified prefix (see 
138     * {@link #onGet(org.jgrapes.http.events.Request.In.Get, IOSubchannel)}).
139     *
140     * @param webletChannel the weblet channel
141     * @param consoleChannel the console channel
142     * @param consolePrefix the console prefix
143     */
144    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseStringBufferForStringAppends")
145    public ConsoleWeblet(Channel webletChannel, Channel consoleChannel,
146            URI consolePrefix) {
147        this(webletChannel, new WebConsole(consoleChannel));
148
149        prefix = URI.create(consolePrefix.getPath().endsWith("/")
150            ? consolePrefix.getPath()
151            : consolePrefix.getPath() + "/");
152        console.setView(this);
153
154        String consolePath = prefix.getPath();
155        if (consolePath.endsWith("/")) {
156            consolePath = consolePath.substring(0, consolePath.length() - 1);
157        }
158        consolePath = consolePath + "|**";
159        try {
160            requestPattern = new ResourcePattern(consolePath);
161        } catch (ParseException e) {
162            throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
163        }
164        consoleResourceSearchSeq = consoleHierarchy();
165
166        resourceClasses.addAll(consoleHierarchy());
167        updateSupportedLocales();
168
169        RequestHandler.Evaluator.add(this, "onGet", prefix + "**");
170        RequestHandler.Evaluator.add(this, "onGetRedirect",
171            prefix.getPath().substring(
172                0, prefix.getPath().length() - 1));
173    }
174
175    private ConsoleWeblet(Channel webletChannel, WebConsole console) {
176        super(webletChannel, ChannelReplacements.create()
177            .add(ConsoleChannel.class, console.channel()));
178        this.console = console;
179        attach(console);
180    }
181
182    /**
183     * Return the list of classes that form the current console
184     * weblet implementation. This consists of all classes from
185     * `getClass()` up to `ConsoleWeblet.class`. 
186     *
187     * @return the list
188     */
189    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
190    protected final List<Class<?>> consoleHierarchy() {
191        List<Class<?>> result = new ArrayList<>();
192        Class<?> derivative = getClass();
193        while (true) {
194            result.add(derivative);
195            if (derivative.equals(ConsoleWeblet.class)) {
196                break;
197            }
198            derivative = derivative.getSuperclass();
199        }
200        return result;
201    }
202
203    /**
204     * Returns the name of the styling library or toolkit used by the console.
205     * This value is informative. It may, however, be used by
206     * a {@link PageResourceProviderFactory} to influence the creation
207     * of {@link PageResourceProvider}s.
208     *
209     * @return the value
210     */
211    public abstract String styling();
212
213    /**
214     * @return the prefix
215     */
216    public URI prefix() {
217        return prefix;
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Returns the automatically generated {@link WebConsole} component.
222     *
223     * @return the console
224     */
225    public WebConsole console() {
226        return console;
227    }
228
229    /**
230     * Sets the console session network timeout. The console session will be
231     * removed if no messages have been received from the console session
232     * for the given duration. The value defaults to 45 seconds.
233     * 
234     * @param timeout the timeout in milli seconds
235     * @return the console view for easy chaining
236     */
237    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LinguisticNaming")
238    public ConsoleWeblet setConsoleSessionNetworkTimeout(Duration timeout) {
239        csNetworkTimeout = timeout.toMillis();
240        return this;
241    }
242
243    /**
244     * Returns the console session network timeout.
245     *
246     * @return the timeout
247     */
248    public Duration consoleSessionNetworkTimeout() {
249        return Duration.ofMillis(csNetworkTimeout);
250    }
251
252    /**
253     * Sets the console session refresh interval. The console code in the
254     * browser will send a keep alive packet if there has been no user
255     * activity for more than the given period. The value 
256     * defaults to 30 seconds.
257     * 
258     * @param interval the interval
259     * @return the console view for easy chaining
260     */
261    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LinguisticNaming")
262    public ConsoleWeblet setConsoleSessionRefreshInterval(Duration interval) {
263        csRefreshInterval = interval.toMillis();
264        return this;
265    }
266
267    /**
268     * Returns the console session refresh interval.
269     *
270     * @return the interval
271     */
272    public Duration consoleSessionRefreshInterval() {
273        return Duration.ofMillis(csRefreshInterval);
274    }
275
276    /**
277     * Sets the console session inactivity timeout. If there has been no
278     * user activity for more than the given duration the
279     * console code stops sending keep alive packets and displays a
280     * message to the user. The value defaults to -1 (no timeout).
281     * 
282     * @param timeout the timeout
283     * @return the console view for easy chaining
284     */
285    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.LinguisticNaming")
286    public ConsoleWeblet setConsoleSessionInactivityTimeout(Duration timeout) {
287        csInactivityTimeout = timeout.toMillis();
288        return this;
289    }
290
291    /**
292     * Returns the console session inactivity timeout.
293     *
294     * @return the timeout
295     */
296    public Duration consoleSessionInactivityTimeout() {
297        return Duration.ofMillis(csInactivityTimeout);
298    }
299
300    /**
301     * Returns whether resources are minified.
302     *
303     * @return the useMinifiedResources
304     */
305    public boolean useMinifiedResources() {
306        return useMinifiedResources;
307    }
308
309    /**
310     * Determines if resources should be minified.
311     *
312     * @param useMinifiedResources the useMinifiedResources to set
313     */
314    public void setUseMinifiedResources(boolean useMinifiedResources) {
315        this.useMinifiedResources = useMinifiedResources;
316    }
317
318    /**
319     * Provides the render support.
320     * 
321     * @return the render support
322     */
323    protected RenderSupport renderSupport() {
324        return renderSupport;
325    }
326
327    /**
328     * Prepends a class to the list of classes used to lookup console
329     * resources. See {@link ConsoleResourceBundleControl#newBundle}.
330     * Affects the content of the resource bundle returned by
331     * {@link #consoleResourceBundle(Locale)}. 
332     * 
333     * @param cls the class to prepend.
334     * @return the console weblet for easy chaining
335     */
336    public ConsoleWeblet prependResourceBundleProvider(Class<?> cls) {
337        resourceClasses.add(0, cls);
338        updateSupportedLocales();
339        return this;
340    }
341
342    /**
343     * Update the supported locales.
344     */
345    protected final void updateSupportedLocales() {
346        supportedLocales.clear();
347        ResourceBundle.clearCache(ConsoleWeblet.class.getClassLoader());
348        for (Locale locale : Locale.getAvailableLocales()) {
349            if ("".equals(locale.getLanguage())) {
350                continue;
351            }
352            ResourceBundle bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle("l10n", locale,
353                ConsoleWeblet.class.getClassLoader(), resourceControl);
354            if (bundle.getLocale().equals(locale)) {
355                supportedLocales.put(locale, bundle);
356            }
357        }
358    }
359
360    /**
361     * Return the console resources for a given locale.
362     *
363     * @param locale the locale
364     * @return the resource bundle
365     */
366    public ResourceBundle consoleResourceBundle(Locale locale) {
367        return ResourceBundle.getBundle("l10n", locale,
368            ConsoleWeblet.class.getClassLoader(), resourceControl);
369    }
370
371    /**
372     * Returns the supported locales and their resource bundles.
373     *
374     * @return the set of locales supported by the console and their
375     * resource bundles
376     */
377    protected Map<Locale, ResourceBundle> supportedLocales() {
378        return supportedLocales;
379    }
380
381    /**
382     * Redirects `GET` requests without trailing slash.
383     *
384     * @param event the event
385     * @param channel the channel
386     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
387     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
388     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
389     */
390    @RequestHandler(dynamic = true)
391    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
392    public void onGetRedirect(Request.In.Get event, IOSubchannel channel)
393            throws InterruptedException, IOException, ParseException {
394        HttpResponse response = event.httpRequest().response().get();
395        response.setStatus(HttpStatus.MOVED_PERMANENTLY)
396            .setContentType("text", "plain", UTF_8)
397            .setField(HttpField.LOCATION, prefix);
398        channel.respond(new Response(response));
399        try {
400            channel.respond(Output.from(prefix.toString()
401                .getBytes(UTF_8), true));
402        } catch (UnsupportedEncodingException e) {
403            // Supported by definition
404        }
405        event.setResult(true);
406        event.stop();
407    }
408
409    /**
410     * Handle the `GET` requests for the various resources. The requests
411     * have to start with the prefix passed to the constructor. Further
412     * processing depends on the next path segment:
413     * 
414     * * `.../console-base-resource`: Provide a resource associated
415     *   with this class. The resources are:
416     *   
417     *   * `jgconsole.js`: The JavaScript module with helper classes
418     *   * `console.css`: Some basic styles for conlets
419     *
420     * * `.../console-resource`: Invokes {@link #provideConsoleResource}
421     *   with the remainder of the path.
422     *   
423     * * `.../page-resource`: Invokes {@link #providePageResource}
424     *   with the remainder of the path.
425     *   
426     * * `.../conlet-resource`: Invokes {@link #provideConletResource}
427     *   with the remainder of the path.
428     *   
429     * * `.../console-session`: Handled by this class. Used
430     *   e.g. for initiating the web socket connection.
431     *
432     * @param event the event
433     * @param channel the channel
434     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
435     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
436     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
437     */
438    @RequestHandler(dynamic = true)
439    public void onGet(Request.In.Get event, IOSubchannel channel)
440            throws InterruptedException, IOException, ParseException {
441        URI requestUri = event.requestUri();
442        int prefixSegs = requestPattern.matches(requestUri);
443        // Request for console? (Only valid with session)
444        if (prefixSegs < 0) {
445            return;
446        }
447
448        // Normalize and evaluate
449        String requestPath = ResourcePattern.removeSegments(
450            requestUri.getPath(), prefixSegs + 1);
451        String[] requestParts = ResourcePattern.split(requestPath, 1);
452        switch (requestParts[0]) {
453        case "":
454            // Because language is changed via websocket, locale cookie
455            // may be out-dated
456            event.associated(Selection.class)
457                .ifPresent(selection -> selection.prefer(selection.get()[0]));
458            // This is a console session now (can be connected to)
459            Session session = Session.from(event);
460            UUID consoleSessionId = UUID.randomUUID();
461            @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
462            Map<URI, UUID> knownIds = (Map<URI, UUID>) session.computeIfAbsent(
463                CONSOLE_SESSION_IDS,
464                newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<URI, UUID>());
465            knownIds.put(prefix, consoleSessionId);
466            // Finally render
467            renderConsole(event, channel, consoleSessionId);
468            return;
469        case "console-resource":
470            provideConsoleResource(event, ResourcePattern.removeSegments(
471                requestUri.getPath(), prefixSegs + 2), channel);
472            return;
473        case "console-base-resource":
474            ResponseCreationSupport.sendStaticContent(event, channel,
475                path -> ConsoleWeblet.class.getResource(requestParts[1]),
476                null);
477            return;
478        case "page-resource":
479            providePageResource(event, channel, requestParts[1]);
480            return;
481        case "console-session":
482            handleSessionRequest(event, channel, requestParts[1]);
483            return;
484        case "conlet-resource":
485            provideConletResource(event, channel, URI.create(requestParts[1]));
486            return;
487        default:
488            break;
489        }
490    }
491
492    /**
493     * Render the console page.
494     *
495     * @param event the event
496     * @param channel the channel
497     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
498     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
499     */
500    protected abstract void renderConsole(Request.In.Get event,
501            IOSubchannel channel, UUID consoleSessionId)
502            throws IOException, InterruptedException;
503
504    /**
505     * Provide a console resource. The implementation tries to load the
506     * resource using {@link Class#getResource(String)} for each class
507     * in the class hierarchy, starting with the finally derived class.
508     *
509     * @param event the event
510     * @param requestPath the request path relativized to the 
511     * common part for console resources
512     * @param channel the channel
513     */
514    protected void provideConsoleResource(Request.In.Get event,
515            String requestPath, IOSubchannel channel) {
516        for (Class<?> cls : consoleResourceSearchSeq) {
517            if (ResponseCreationSupport.sendStaticContent(event, channel,
518                path -> cls.getResource(requestPath),
519                null)) {
520                break;
521            }
522        }
523    }
524
525    /**
526     * Prepends the given class to the list of classes searched by
527     * {@link #provideConsoleResource(Request.In.Get, String, IOSubchannel)}.
528     * 
529     * @param cls the class to prepend
530     * @return the console weblet for easy chaining
531     */
532    public ConsoleWeblet prependConsoleResourceProvider(Class<?> cls) {
533        consoleResourceSearchSeq.add(0, cls);
534        return this;
535    }
536
537    private void providePageResource(Request.In.Get event, IOSubchannel channel,
538            String resource) throws InterruptedException {
539        // Send events to providers on console's channel
540        PageResourceRequest pageResourceRequest = new PageResourceRequest(
541            WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(resource),
542            event.httpRequest().findValue(HttpField.IF_MODIFIED_SINCE,
543                Converters.DATE_TIME).orElse(null),
544            event.httpRequest(), channel, Session.from(event), renderSupport());
545        event.setResult(true);
546        event.stop();
547        fire(pageResourceRequest, consoleChannel(channel));
548    }
549
550    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
551    private void provideConletResource(Request.In.Get event,
552            IOSubchannel channel,
553            URI resource) throws InterruptedException {
554        try {
555            String resPath = resource.getPath();
556            int sep = resPath.indexOf('/');
557            // Send events to web console components on console's channel
558            ConletResourceRequest conletRequest
559                = new ConletResourceRequest(
560                    resPath.substring(0, sep),
561                    new URI(null, null, resPath.substring(sep + 1),
562                        event.requestUri().getQuery(),
563                        event.requestUri().getFragment()),
564                    event.httpRequest().findValue(HttpField.IF_MODIFIED_SINCE,
565                        Converters.DATE_TIME).orElse(null),
566                    event.httpRequest(), channel,
567                    Session.from(event), renderSupport());
568            // Make session available (associate with event, this is not
569            // a websocket request).
570            event.associated(Session.class, Supplier.class).ifPresent(
571                supplier -> conletRequest.setAssociated(Session.class,
572                    supplier));
573            event.setResult(true);
574            event.stop();
575            fire(conletRequest, consoleChannel(channel));
576        } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
577            // Won't happen, new URI derived from existing
578        }
579    }
580
581    /**
582     * The console channel for getting resources. Resource providers
583     * respond on the same event pipeline as they receive, because
584     * handling is just a mapping to {@link ResourceRequestCompleted}.
585     *
586     * @param channel the channel
587     * @return the IO subchannel
588     */
589    private IOSubchannel consoleChannel(IOSubchannel channel) {
590        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
591        Optional<LinkedIOSubchannel> consoleChannel
592            = (Optional<LinkedIOSubchannel>) LinkedIOSubchannel
593                .downstreamChannel(console, channel);
594        return consoleChannel.orElseGet(
595            () -> new ConsoleResourceChannel(
596                console, channel, activeEventPipeline()));
597    }
598
599    /**
600     * Handles the {@link ResourceRequestCompleted} event.
601     *
602     * @param event the event
603     * @param channel the channel
604     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
605     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
606     */
607    @Handler(channels = ConsoleChannel.class)
608    public void onResourceRequestCompleted(
609            ResourceRequestCompleted event, ConsoleResourceChannel channel)
610            throws IOException, InterruptedException {
611        event.stop();
612        if (event.event().get() == null) {
613            ResponseCreationSupport.sendResponse(event.event().httpRequest(),
614                event.event().httpChannel(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);
615            return;
616        }
617        event.event().get().process();
618    }
619
620    private void handleSessionRequest(Request.In.Get event,
621            IOSubchannel channel, String consoleSessionId)
622            throws InterruptedException, IOException, ParseException {
623        // Must be WebSocket request.
624        if (!event.httpRequest().findField(
625            HttpField.UPGRADE, Converters.STRING_LIST)
626            .map(fld -> fld.value().containsIgnoreCase("websocket"))
627            .orElse(false)) {
628            return;
629        }
630
631        // Can only connect to sessions that have been prepared
632        // by loading the console. (Prevents using a newly created
633        // browser session from being (re-)connected to after a
634        // long disconnect or restart and, of course, CSF).
635        final Session browserSession = Session.from(event);
636        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
637        Map<URI, UUID> knownIds = (Map<URI, UUID>) browserSession
638            .computeIfAbsent(CONSOLE_SESSION_IDS,
639                newKey -> new ConcurrentHashMap<URI, UUID>());
640        if (!UUID.fromString(consoleSessionId) // NOPMD, note negation
641            .equals(knownIds.get(prefix))) {
642            channel.setAssociated(this, new String[2]);
643        } else {
644            channel.setAssociated(this, new String[] {
645                consoleSessionId,
646                Optional.ofNullable(event.httpRequest().queryData()
647                    .get("was")).map(vals -> vals.get(0)).orElse(null)
648            });
649        }
650        channel.respond(new ProtocolSwitchAccepted(event, "websocket"));
651        event.stop();
652    }
653
654    /**
655     * Handles a change of Locale for the console.
656     *
657     * @param event the event
658     * @param channel the channel
659     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
660     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
661     */
662    @Handler(channels = ConsoleChannel.class, priority = 10_000)
663    public void onSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleSession channel)
664            throws InterruptedException, IOException {
665        channel.setLocale(event.locale());
666        Session session = channel.browserSession();
667        if (session != null) {
668            Selection selection = (Selection) session.get(Selection.class);
669            if (selection != null) {
670                supportedLocales.keySet().stream()
671                    .filter(lang -> lang.equals(event.locale())).findFirst()
672                    .ifPresent(lang -> selection.prefer(lang));
673            }
674        }
675        if (event.reload()) {
676            channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload"));
677        }
678    }
679
680    /**
681     * Sends a reload if the change of locale could not be handled by
682     * all conlets.
683     *
684     * @param event the event
685     * @param channel the channel
686     */
687    @Handler(channels = ConsoleChannel.class)
688    public void onSetLocaleCompleted(SetLocaleCompleted event,
689            ConsoleSession channel) {
690        if (event.event().reload()) {
691            channel.respond(new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload"));
692        }
693    }
694
695    /**
696     * Called when the connection has been upgraded.
697     *
698     * @param event the event
699     * @param wsChannel the ws channel
700     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
701     */
702    @Handler
703    public void onUpgraded(Upgraded event, IOSubchannel wsChannel)
704            throws IOException {
705        Optional<String[]> passedIn
706            = wsChannel.associated(this, String[].class);
707        if (!passedIn.isPresent()) {
708            return;
709        }
710
711        // Check if reload required
712        String[] consoleSessionIds = passedIn.get();
713        if (consoleSessionIds[0] == null) {
714            @SuppressWarnings("resource")
715            CharBufferWriter out = new CharBufferWriter(wsChannel,
716                wsChannel.responsePipeline()).suppressClose();
717            new SimpleConsoleCommand("reload").toJson(out);
718            out.close();
719            event.stop();
720            return;
721        }
722
723        // Get console session
724        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
725        final Supplier<Optional<Session>> sessionSupplier
726            = (Supplier<Optional<Session>>) wsChannel
727                .associated(Session.class, Supplier.class).get();
728        // Reuse old console session if still available
729        ConsoleSession consoleSession
730            = Optional.ofNullable(consoleSessionIds[1])
731                .flatMap(opsId -> ConsoleSession.lookup(opsId))
732                .map(session -> session.replaceId(consoleSessionIds[0]))
733                .orElse(ConsoleSession.lookupOrCreate(consoleSessionIds[0],
734                    console, supportedLocales.keySet(), csNetworkTimeout))
735                .setUpstreamChannel(wsChannel)
736                .setSessionSupplier(sessionSupplier);
737        wsChannel.setAssociated(ConsoleSession.class, consoleSession);
738        // Channel now used as JSON input
739        wsChannel.setAssociated(this, new WebSocketInputReader(
740            event.processedBy().get(), consoleSession));
741        // From now on, only consoleSession.respond may be used to send on the
742        // upstream channel.
743        consoleSession.upstreamChannel().responsePipeline()
744            .restrictEventSource(consoleSession.responsePipeline());
745    }
746
747    /**
748     * Discard the session referenced in the event.
749     *
750     * @param event the event
751     */
752    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
753    public void onDiscardSession(DiscardSession event) {
754        final Session session = event.session();
755        ConsoleSession.byConsole(console).stream()
756            .filter(cs -> cs != null && cs.browserSession().equals(session))
757            .forEach(cs -> {
758                cs.responsePipeline().fire(new Close(), cs.upstreamChannel());
759            });
760    }
761
762    /**
763     * Handles network input (JSON data).
764     *
765     * @param event the event
766     * @param wsChannel the ws channel
767     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
768     */
769    @Handler
770    public void onInput(Input<CharBuffer> event, IOSubchannel wsChannel)
771            throws IOException {
772        Optional<WebSocketInputReader> optWsInputReader
773            = wsChannel.associated(this, WebSocketInputReader.class);
774        if (optWsInputReader.isPresent()) {
775            optWsInputReader.get().write(event.buffer().backingBuffer());
776        }
777    }
778
779    /**
780     * Handles the closed event from the web socket.
781     *
782     * @param event the event
783     * @param wsChannel the WebSocket channel
784     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
785     */
786    @Handler
787    public void onClosed(
788            Closed event, IOSubchannel wsChannel) throws IOException {
789        Optional<WebSocketInputReader> optWsInputReader
790            = wsChannel.associated(this, WebSocketInputReader.class);
791        if (optWsInputReader.isPresent()) {
792            wsChannel.setAssociated(this, null);
793            optWsInputReader.get().close();
794        }
795        wsChannel.associated(ConsoleSession.class).ifPresent(session -> {
796            // Restore channel to normal mode, see onConsoleReady
797            session.responsePipeline().restrictEventSource(null);
798            session.disconnected();
799        });
800    }
801
802    /**
803     * Handles the {@link ConsoleReady} event.
804     *
805     * @param event the event
806     * @param consoleSession the console session
807     */
808    @Handler(channels = ConsoleChannel.class)
809    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event,
810            ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
811        String principal
812            = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(consoleSession.browserSession())
813                .map(UserPrincipal::toString).orElse("");
814        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
815            "/" + principal + "/themeProvider", consoleSession);
816        fire(query, consoleSession);
817    }
818
819    /**
820     * Sends a command to the console.
821     *
822     * @param event the event
823     * @param channel the channel
824     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
825     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
826     */
827    @Handler(channels = ConsoleChannel.class, priority = -1000)
828    public void onConsoleCommand(
829            ConsoleCommand event, ConsoleSession channel)
830            throws InterruptedException, IOException {
831        IOSubchannel upstream = channel.upstreamChannel();
832        @SuppressWarnings("resource")
833        CharBufferWriter out = new CharBufferWriter(upstream,
834            upstream.responsePipeline()).suppressClose();
835        event.toJson(out);
836    }
837
838    /**
839     * The channel used to send {@link PageResourceRequest}s and
840     * {@link ConletResourceRequest}s to the web console components (via the
841     * console).
842     */
843    public class ConsoleResourceChannel extends LinkedIOSubchannel {
844
845        /**
846         * Instantiates a new console resource channel.
847         *
848         * @param hub the hub
849         * @param upstreamChannel the upstream channel
850         * @param responsePipeline the response pipeline
851         */
852        public ConsoleResourceChannel(Manager hub,
853                IOSubchannel upstreamChannel, EventPipeline responsePipeline) {
854            super(hub, hub.channel(), upstreamChannel, responsePipeline);
855        }
856    }
857
858    /**
859     * The implementation of {@link RenderSupport} used by this class.
860     */
861    private class RenderSupportImpl implements RenderSupport {
862
863        @Override
864        public URI consoleBaseResource(URI uri) {
865            return prefix
866                .resolve(WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath("console-base-resource/"))
867                .resolve(uri);
868        }
869
870        @Override
871        public URI consoleResource(URI uri) {
872            return prefix
873                .resolve(WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath("console-resource/"))
874                .resolve(uri);
875        }
876
877        @Override
878        public URI conletResource(String conletType, URI uri) {
879            return prefix.resolve(WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
880                "conlet-resource/" + conletType + "/")).resolve(uri);
881        }
882
883        @Override
884        public URI pageResource(URI uri) {
885            return prefix.resolve(WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
886                "page-resource/")).resolve(uri);
887        }
888
889        /*
890         * (non-Javadoc)
891         * 
892         * @see
893         * org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.base.RenderSupport#useMinifiedResources()
894         */
895        @Override
896        public boolean useMinifiedResources() {
897            return useMinifiedResources;
898        }
899
900    }
901
902}
